title: entanucu sairintunu
sahitya:
entanucu sairintunu sAtA kAnta daya rAdu



anupallavi



muni cintanIya shrI rAmacandra nA centa rAninka manasu rAdA



caraNam 1



sama rahitA samAna nE dAsuDau samAna pAlana nA moralu vE

samAyenA sujanAvana

     shubhakaram Apta parivArAmara vinuta ramAramana itaramA nIku

nEn-



caraNam 2



bharAjamuga vrsabharAjapa nuta ibharAja varada sadA bhakta

sulabha

     rAjanya shubhada satata mauni rAjanuta yavani rAja paricara

nirAtanka nirAmaya nEn-



caraNam 3



virAja vAhana virAjamAna kavirAja rakSaka nA tapamu lanni

virAjasamulE nA jnAna

     mosagu rAja janaka nagarAja dhara tyAgarAjanuta nAgarAja

shayanan-
